m_szDocSumamry: Apple's next big thing: Augmented reality (Apple) Reprints Apple's ( AAPL ) next big thing, which few people are talking about today, is augmented reality, Piper Jaffray analyst Gene Munster said Wednesday. Speaking at Business Insider's Ignition conference , Munster gave his predictions for Apple in 2016 and beyond. Augmented or "mixed" reality devices are a longer-term initiative that could eventually replace the iPhone, he said.
